Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Giorgione in Venice (Cannaregio), you'll be minutes from Ca' D'Oro Waterbus and Rialto Bridge. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Ca' d'Oro and Galleria Giorgio Franchetti alla Ca' d'Oro.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 76 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Giorgione. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Giorgione. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.

With a stay at Hotel Giorgione in Venice (Cannaregio), you'll be minutes from Ca' D'Oro Waterbus and Rialto Bridge. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Ca' d'Oro and Galleria Giorgio Franchetti alla Ca' d'Oro.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Ca' D'Oro Waterbus - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Ca' d'Oro - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Galleria Giorgio Franchetti alla Ca' d'Oro - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Chiesa Santa Maria dei Miracoli - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Pescaria - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Teatro Malibran - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Rialto Bridge - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Ca'Pesaro - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Basilica di San Giovanni e Paolo - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Scuola Grande di San Marco - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Bartolomeo Colleoni Monument - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
San Salvador Church - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
San Stae - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Le Zitelle - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Fondamenta Nuove Marina - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Giorgione is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Giorgione is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7 km / 4.4 mi.
